name: 7/15/19: The Elevator
description:
Title of the game is a throwback to the first game I ever uploaded on to this site, which I made in a similarly very short frame of time (12/4/16 was made in just a couple of hours for a jam last-minute, as was this game).

-made in 4 hours for Tasting Room Jam: Summer 2019
-all photos are mine
-CW: depression themes, suicide ideation, references to substance dependency (the ending is more upbeat though, lol)
